entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 1.0.0.178. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv and dqc_0011.csv successful. - /var/folders/18/_kbcbv855dxf82x5yvny6h0c0000gn/T/tmp7tlv3c3w/packages/resources.zip

[DQC.US.0060.7497] This rule reflects updated guidance from the Data Quality Committee which contradicts with historical rules. This is a change based on the changes in the cashflow ASU published by FASB. The element us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivitiesContinuingOperations has been reported with a value of -6,681,000. However no value has been reported for either the element(s) NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivities and CashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivitiesDiscontinuedOperations. It is expected that if the element us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivitiesContinuingOperations is reported then values would be reported for these corresponding elements. If the value of -6,681,000 represents the value of NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivities then this more general element should be used as it is a required disclosure.
The properties of this us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivitiesContinuingOperations fact are: Period :2017-01-01 to 2017-06-30 Dimensions : Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:7497 Rule version: 9.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/741815/000074181518000027/hh-20170630.xml 3275

property.name: label
property.value: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Continuing Operations

entry.message:
[DQC.US.0060.7497] This rule reflects updated guidance from the Data Quality Committee which contradicts with historical rules. This is a change based on the changes in the cashflow ASU published by FASB. The element us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivitiesContinuingOperations has been reported with a value of -4,848,000. However no value has been reported for either the element(s) NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivities and CashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivitiesDiscontinuedOperations. It is expected that if the element us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivitiesContinuingOperations is reported then values would be reported for these corresponding elements. If the value of -4,848,000 represents the value of NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivities then this more general element should be used as it is a required disclosure.
The properties of this us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivitiesContinuingOperations fact are: Period :2016-01-01 to 2016-06-30 Dimensions : Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:7497 Rule version: 9.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/741815/000074181518000027/hh-20170630.xml 3273

property.name: label
property.value: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Continuing Operations
